title: The Man Who’s Going to Save Your Neighborhood Grocery Store
excerpt: American food supplies are increasingly channeled through a handful of big companies: Amazon, Walmart, FreshDirect, Blue Apron. What do we lose when local supermarkets go under? A lot -- and Kevin Kelley wants to stop that.

title: The Hottest Restaurant in France Is an All-You-Can-Eat Buffet
excerpt: Les Grands Buffets features a seven-tiered lobster tower, a chocolate fountain, and only what it considers traditional French food. Gourmands are willing to wait months for a table.

title: Revolutionary culinary collective Ghetto Gastro is bringing its goods to Ta
excerpt: Starting today, you can pick up Ghetto Gastro's new food goods at Target.

title: The unique culture of Japanese convenience stores - BBC Travel
excerpt: The true star of the Akutagawa Prize-winning novel Convenience Store Woman is the convenience store itself. But what is it that makes these shops so magical?

title: The Aldi effect: how one discount supermarket transformed the way Britain s
excerpt: The long read: When Aldi arrived in Britain, Tesco and Sainsbury’s were sure they had nothing to worry about. Three decades later, they know better
